description: I want to meet a beautiful, elegant, cultured, professional, sensitive woman who wants to grow and enjoy life, I have no children, open mind, educated, athletic, I like art and music, reserved, I really like sensuality and femininity, affectionate like pets especially felines, with interests in professional academics in the near future, I love reading and good talks with a coffee, I like to walk in the rain, wine, good food in general, I hope I have not bored you with the description I will be attentive, if you want to chat with pleasure I will be waiting, bye
